scripts.prebuild: npm run contract:build && rm -rf target && cp ../target/ink/invariant.wasm ./contracts/invariant/ && cp ../target/ink/invariant.json ./contracts/invariant
scripts.wasm:build: cd math && wasm-pack build && npm run wasm:package
scripts.wasm:package: cd math/pkg && npm pkg set type='module'
scripts.node:stop: ps aux | grep substrate-contracts-node | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ' ' -f 2 | head -n 1 | xargs -r kill -9
scripts.contract:build: cd .. && cargo contract build --release && cd sdk
